title: Certain state lawmakers aim to loosen childhood vaccine requirements, but legal barriers persist

title_detail.value: Certain state lawmakers aim to loosen childhood vaccine requirements, but legal barriers persist

summary: An analysis of proposed vaccine legislation between 2011 and 2017 shows that although the majority of proposed bills would have allowed more parents to exempt their children from school immunization requirements, those that favored vaccines were more likely to become law.

summary_detail.value: An analysis of proposed vaccine legislation between 2011 and 2017 shows that although the majority of proposed bills would have allowed more parents to exempt their children from school immunization requirements, those that favored vaccines were more likely to become law.
